dialogue.text: Hey, what gives?! Why didn't you turn into your cool cloudy form?
Was I supposed to? Ahaha, I'm still not sure how to do that consistently.
Aww, what? There's gotta be something you know about it! C'mon, please tell me! Please please please?
Well... it usually manifests when I feel as if I'm one with my music.
It's not a conscious feeling, mind you, so maybe all it takes is to just... let yourself free? Sorry if that's not the best explaination.
Let myself free..?
...rghh, I don't get it. Let's just keep playing! I'll keep going until I finally figure out your secret!
Easy now, Spicy. She's got her own plans to attend to.
Smoki-doki! I haven't seen you all week! Where have you been, you dork?
I had some personal business to take care of. It's good to see you, Spicy.
Look, look! I finally found them! Sweety and Greeny!
...why am I Greeny, exactly?
Cause you got green hair, duh!
It's a hat.
(Geez, why does everyone think that this is my hair?)
I hope Spicy hasn't given you too much trouble, Sweet. She's just been eager to meet you.
Oh, it's been no trouble at all! It's been a pleasure ever since I've got here. I'm happy to have met even more new faces.
Hey, Sweet, we should probably get going now. I don't know how much longer the ramen shop'll be open.
Well, have a good one, you two. We'll be on our way as well.
Hey, wait! We can't leave now! Now that Smoki-doki's here, this is the perfect opportunity for a 2V2!
What? Another bout? How much energy do you got, girl?
More than enough! I'm not letting this opportunity go to waste!
It's a tempting offer, but I wouldn't want to keep them too much longer.
I wouldn't mind! Well... only if you're ok with it too, Sour.
...eh, y'know what? I've been playing all day already; Might as well keep the music train rolling.
Sucks that it's gotta happen on an empty stomach, but I still got enough energy to go full crazy!
Let's waste no time and begin.
I'm ready when you are!
Yeah! That's what I'm talking about! Hit it!
*deep breath*
Let myself free... is that really it?
